website_summaries.verdict: A "would you rather" scenarios game that get get as risqué or ridiculous as players want.
pros: Players compete to see just who's willing to opt for the most jaw-dropping would-you-rather scenarios, while the judge awards the anonymous winner for best answer – then all players find out who picked that as their answer
cons: Requires at least 3 players and lowered inhibitions
Not for those who are easily offended or grossed out

customer_reviews.title: Read directions while still sober
customer_reviews.text: Not gonna lie, the directions are hard to understand when you've been drinking all day so do yourself a favor and read the how to play directions BEFORE you get smashed. We all had a blast playing this game and whomever came up with some of these scenarios should be ashamed of themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Adult "Pick Your Poison Game" is too vulgar!
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to play this game and debated between ordering the adult or the family version. We went with the adult version because the description said it would be appropriate for adults and teens. It is not. The questions on the back of the box are: "which would you choose: a penis shaped phone or have Google publish your search history? Or have sex with sheep or participate in a nursing home orgy?" We didn't even open the box after we saw that. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: amy hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Great fun! But Seems a Tad Tame...
customer_reviews.text: This game is simple to start, and eat to modify rules depending on the situation. Only thing I would have liked to see is more "aggressive" NSFW cards. We haven't played through even 1/4 of the deck, so please take this with a grain of salt, but a majority of the cards we drew were very tame.. albeit some were morally wrong... But they weren't CoH NSFW. All that being said, it is great, funny and worth the $25. Hoping future plays make me eat my words!
customer_reviews.author: Zach C.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this game because it is very different
customer_reviews.text: I really like this game because it is very different. It forces you to think of things that you normally wouldn't. Some things are offensive but I like that. It is interesting and not boring. Will definitely buy expansion pack if ever becomes available.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Giovaniello

customer_reviews.title: Very Ronchie
customer_reviews.text: They are not kidding when they say NSFW. I am not a super conservative person and not easily offended. These cards are so out there, that it becomes ridiculous. I love a good "would you rather" game but the majority of these cards ask you to contemplate scenarios like sexual acts with your parent or killing puppies/kittens with your bare hands. I love adult humor but this takes it too far IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary B.

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this version of the game. It's a great idea but the cards are stupid and disgusting. Toast your own hand in the toaster, scam your parents out of their retirement money, have a snapping turtle bite your genitals, get your grandmother addicted to heroin, eat a puppy and stick your hand in a fryer are some of the choices you will have. We've always played "Would you rather..." and we love that so I thought this game would be great fun. I would have ordered the family version but, at the time of my purchase, it was out of stock and this version was my only option. I should have waited.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Weppler

customer_reviews.title: Not funny
customer_reviews.text: Really disgusting content like a group of oerverted 13 year old wrote it. Not funny
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adolescent humor
customer_reviews.text: Adolescent humor at its finest. No one in our group of 10 enjoyed it and it received a resounding 10 thumbs down from everyone. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Fun but a bit complex
customer_reviews.text: This game has been really fun so far! You must read the directions first as it is a bit more complex than similar card games. The game goes like this: the judge picks the A card, then everyone else picks a card to go against A. The judge picks the best one. When card A and B are down, everyone including the judge picks their poison. Majority rules. There are “double down” green cards which equal double points but I don’t use them - the game is complex enough.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to play, but frankly the choices you get to pick from are either too gross, or so gross you'd never choose it making it easy to choose the other one. Also they rely a lot on options that involve poop. Pretty much every other set of two cards will have an option that involves poop. I was expecting something more racy perhaps from the NSFW edition, which would have been fun for a girls night, but this was more disease and poop related "though" choices. My friends were bored in less than five minutes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Krebsbach

customer_reviews.title: Not funny, just gross
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the most vulgar game out there in my opinion. Options like, walking in on your parents giving each other anal or screwing your grandma. Just gross.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Adult Fun and Humorous Exposure
customer_reviews.text: Played this game over the Thanksgiving Holiday and had a complete BLAST!!! Truly ADULT Card Game not for mixed company. Great questions that really expose the side of a person you did not know was there. Laughs galore and some eyebrow raises as well. Overall, highly recommended for family, couple or friends just hanging out and enjoying each other's company.
customer_reviews.author: Cafe Lady

customer_reviews.title: The game is fun, and you will walk away knowing A LOT ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW...this game! We made the mistake of playing in a room near my parents where they could overhear- they thought we were all a bit crazy! It was definitely an interesting game to explain to them because they had no clue what was going on! The game is fun, and you will walk away knowing A LOT more about the people you play with, that is for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Bremer

customer_reviews.title: HILARIOUS💥👏🏻
customer_reviews.text: I took this to friendsgiving and "new phone who dis" to a game night with people and pick your poison NSFW hands down won the evening. Friends being between the ages of 23-37 and everyone laughed their as* off. It was soooooo funny.
customer_reviews.author: Monroe's

customer_reviews.title: While waiting to give it to the friend I got several emails from the company asking me to review it and I felt so bad that I couldn't because I hadn't played it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present for a friend, and I ordered it several weeks ahead of time. While waiting to give it to the friend I got several emails from the company asking me to review it and I felt so bad that I couldn't because I hadn't played it. Now having played it I have no problem giving it a five-star review. I played it with three other people and all of us were constantly laughing and sharing our cards with each other. Each round of drawing a new card lead to people gasping and saying wow. This is a great party game for adults. I would highly recommend it,
customer_reviews.author: Anna Gehring

customer_reviews.title: A very twisted "Would You Rather?"
customer_reviews.text: This game is hilarious. I attend a game night at least once a month with friends and decided to pick this game up. It was definitely an excellent choice: we played for hours, discovered how messed up we really are. I was afraid of it being some spin-off of Cards Against Humanity, but it's absolutely not. I highly recommend it. I do believe they have a family-friendly version; it's purple.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Need the right people
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for an adult game night. We played mostly to the directions, with the exception of the double down. Once you get going, it's pretty fun but you need the right set of people that aren't easily offended. I will definitely play it again because it had us laughing at some of the responses. I also went through and picked out some of the not so funny cards, I don't care who you are a card like "tell people you have cancer when you really don't" is just not funny in any circumstance. The expanded pack is about the same level of funny as the regular pack.
customer_reviews.author: cpmartus

customer_reviews.title: Great, vulgar game.
customer_reviews.text: This game is pretty great...our group was playing a lot of Cards Against Humanity and I wanted to find something different...we've ended up playing this every time we get together. The true gem of the game is the judge being able to add stipulations to the cards they choose, making decisions that much harder. Definitely not okay for kids or those that are super shy, lol. It's a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: A really fun game. Kind of reminds me of cards against ...
customer_reviews.text: A really fun game. Kind of reminds me of cards against humanity as a would you rather. However I find it a bit more replayable as each card can be expanded upon as the players choose. So something that you might otherwise roll your eyes upon getting can still be fun and useful.
customer_reviews.author: joshua nocher

customer_reviews.title: Its fun, its perfect for learning how your friends think ...
customer_reviews.text: It took us about 30 mins to get the hang of how the game is scored. We, thought at first it was up to the judge to pick A or B.Then those who also picked what the judge scored. Its fun, its perfect for learning how your friends think and get to know them better.
customer_reviews.author: Megaroni

customer_reviews.title: Too far- not funny
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this game. I bought to play at a bacholorette party and was hoping for some raunchy cards and certainly expected gross options but this game definitely crossed the line. There were a tremendous amount of antisemitic and incredibly violent cards. The remaining cards usually involved murder, incest, and beastiality. I was looking for a game we could all laugh about but instead I found this to be a incredibly depressing and violent and not something I would want to ask anyone else to play.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: To difficult
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this game. I bought a few for a recent trip to the snow. My friends and I love cards against humanity and what the meme. We had out played both so I bought this. It was to difficult to understand and everyone quickly lost interest.
customer_reviews.author: Huskymama13

customer_reviews.title: Looks so fun.
customer_reviews.text: I have not played yet but I opened the game and it looks super fun. Definitely an adult game though. Some of the cards are too inappropriate for children to read so I recommend mature teenagers and adults only. The packaging was a thick plastic so I was very happy about that. Can’t wait to play!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla W

customer_reviews.title: Beware, crude game!
customer_reviews.text: I returned this game. Wow was it a crude game! I guess I read the info on it wrong or something because it was pretty bad! Not anything I wanted to have in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This game is great I've played it with as little as 5 people total to 12 people. From ages 20-62, it was great. It brought up some good/funny conversations. People have even texted me a couple days after bringing up rounds that we played. It's been a hit all around.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rovelli

customer_reviews.title: Pull the trigger and buy! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: This game is HILARIOUS!! It really gets the conversation going when people try and defend they’re answers. The questions are super inappropriate so beware your audience. We had to take a couple breaks while playing (baby crying etc), but people were so inpatient they kept playing without us, a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great party game
customer_reviews.text: Fun game but better with more people. Definitely NSFW type of game. Easy instructions for a party without a huge learning curve. Just sit down and play.
customer_reviews.author: Thesweetness

customer_reviews.title: Adult fun and humor
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with my purchase. The item is exactly as described. It is definitely an adult game due to the content and language. I played this with my adult kids and son-in-law — we laughed the entire time!! It is not for those who cringe at sexual innuendo and language.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adult game nights
customer_reviews.text: This game is really fun (if you have the right humor for it). It's a little confusing at first, and keeping score can get confusing, but once you get the hang of it, it's great fun. Definitely recommend playing before drinking, as it can be difficult to explain to a room full of drunk people.
customer_reviews.author: Yessydeee

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: So it was my sisters 30th birthday and she just had a baby, so we could do the whole Dirty Thirty shenanigans. So I got her this instead and boy did we have fun. We love to play Cards Against Humanity and this was a fresh take on a similar game. We had a good time playing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and super raunchy
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and super raunchy! My boyfriend and I played this with two of of friends and we’re dying laughing at the choices we picked. Also can get competitive with points being the judge! Definitely cycling this game into our weekly game night!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Would You rather! Love it
customer_reviews.text: This game can be very funny or very serious! It truly comes down to which of the two poisons you would rather choose. I enjoy the part of the game where you can ask the judge for clarification on the poison which can take the decision making to even more crazy choosing. Great with big groups and a mix of people!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Soracco

customer_reviews.title: Juvenile and vulgar
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a prude by any means but the choices on these cards were vulgar, and juvenile at best. “Drink a cup of your father’s sperm.” Seriously? What sick minds came up with this crap? Wasn’t even worth returning. Went straight to the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Just dont
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a funny game to play with friends and close family. But it’s really really not much fun to hear all your fathers preferred poisons . I can honestly say that therapy is in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: david aguayo

customer_reviews.title: Don't play with people who are easily offended Dec or disgusted
customer_reviews.text: A hilarious game. My side hurt from laughing so much. Warning: Don't play with people who are easily offended Dec or disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R Cornier

customer_reviews.title: Laughed so hard...
customer_reviews.text: This might be even more intense than Cards Against Humanity. Bought this game for our big annual Halloween party since reviews said it was good for large groups... I havent seen people laugh that hard in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay S

customer_reviews.title: Fun new game
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sister for Christmas and we played it as a group. Lots of fun!! Its definitely risque so maybe don't play with your mom like we did. Haha it was an interesting experience
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nogales

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Cards Against Humanity
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping for a cards-against-humanity kind of laugh, but this unfortunately fell short of my expectations. It’s okay, but the game doesn’t have an easy flow. It may have helped if we were all completely sober, but what’s the fun in that? The only way we’ll ever play this again is if our cards against humanity is lost or something. Go in with low expectations and you may be alright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok; similar in nature to Cards Against Humanity
customer_reviews.text: Was a little more complicated than our group would have liked. When we finally got the hang of it, we didn’t like it as much as we thought we would.
customer_reviews.author: Working mom in North Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Raunchy horrible stupid questions
customer_reviews.text: I bought the adult version because I didn’t want kid questions. That was a mistake. The content was so raunchy I was horrified when we tried to play it. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: L. John

customer_reviews.title: Super fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Got this game to play with my friends. Not disappointing at all! Will leave you with a warning though, beware turning this into a drinking game! The rum burns when it spews out my nose from laughing while drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Chapman

customer_reviews.title: My our taste!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful!!!! Purchased for adult play at family reunion... Gross questions... disgusting!!! We are fun loving and not very sensitive but this was awful... we didn’t play and I returned it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Adult Party Attention Getter
customer_reviews.text: We played Pick Your Poison with our great friends and it was hilarious! It's funny to see what people will choose if it came down to it for real,. You will be amazed at the choices people will make. It was a lot of fun! Love the game! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cherrie J.

customer_reviews.title: Great would you rather game
customer_reviews.text: Great spin on would you rather game. Got some very interesting and hilarious discussions going around the table. Definitely nsfw.
customer_reviews.author: Garret H.

customer_reviews.title: Great game, easy to learn how to play
customer_reviews.text: Played for the first time last night. Hours of laughter.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to laugh so hard your abs hurt the next day!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this game on a whim and I was not disappointed! I have played on several occasions with my husband and sister, and we always end up laughing until we are crying! Who comes up with these insane ideas??!! Can't wait to play again!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to know more about your friends!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game to play with my friends, and we had a lot of fun! The game is easy to play, and it also brings us closer to our friends. This game is like a Would-you-rather on steroids. There are so many weird dilemmas to ponder about. We also get to know which dilemma each player prefers, which brings every player closer. It's a highly recommend! The shipping was also really fast!
customer_reviews.author: Pond V.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game
customer_reviews.text: It really depends on the people toy play with, but the game is really fun regardless. But having, open minded extroverts, that expand, and debate scenarios is fun as hell!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Cringe worthy fun
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time, as ordered. Thumbed through the cards and they are certainly thought provoking and Uber cringe worthy considerations. I can’t wait for our friends to join us for a game where we can poke fun at each other, and contimplate choices.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Funny and inappropriate!
customer_reviews.text: Game is funny as h***. We have just been picking 2-3 pairs of cards for the last few days at work during lunch. Having an official ‘party’ this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Stop reading reviews and just buy it already, it's awesome.
customer_reviews.text: A super fun alternative to Cards Against Humanity. I hope they put out expansion packs! We were laughing and cringing for hours.
customer_reviews.author: KNC

customer_reviews.title: Adding flavor to game night!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to play this to add some variety beyond Cards Against Humanity with the same type of group dynamic, but in a different context! It did the trick!! Fun and raunchy!
customer_reviews.author: Christi C

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious and tons of fun. Just an FYI
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious and tons of fun. Just an FYI, don't buy if you're easily offended. Otherwise, it's a great party game and a hilarious way to find out how twisted all of your friends are.
customer_reviews.author: PrimordialStar

customer_reviews.title: Great game for adults
customer_reviews.text: It's hilarious game that you would wanna play with friends if you don't mind crude sense of humor
customer_reviews.author: trotterp

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present and gave it to my friend early since I won't see him. It's a blast! Packaging is adequate as well so there is no need to buy a card case.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: Funny Mature Game
customer_reviews.text: Great game for adults, a lot of mature content in it but if you have a sick sense of humor and want to relax and have fun with your pals this is a great game. You do need 3 players to play it, we had a good amount of laughs playing it the first time. Lots of cards to work with too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great party game!
customer_reviews.text: Played this game with my friends and we couldn't stop laughing. NSFW has some gnarly cards that will make you laugh and cringe. Worst/favorite card Would you rather "Poop a little every time you sit down" or "Use hot sauce as eye drops"
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Quite an interesting game, similar to others of this nature, with a slight twist. Played quite a few games the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Excellent game
customer_reviews.text: From the moment you open the box, you will be thrilled with your purchase. The packaging is well done and sturdy. The cards are thick and will hold up for hours of game play. Loads of fun! Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J Krofft

customer_reviews.title: Not for the weak!
customer_reviews.text: Very graphic and not for the weak at heart lol! Have to have a open mind and not take everything so seriously. It’s just a game! We had a good time playing.
customer_reviews.author: This Gal

customer_reviews.title: Fun games!
customer_reviews.text: Funniest game with a group of early 20 something kids! But be ready to learn a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious
customer_reviews.text: Super funny and easy to play. Definitely a game to play with people you are not shy around.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Fun Party Game
customer_reviews.text: This game was a recent hit at a gift exchange and subsequently had to play!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Rose

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting and hysterical
customer_reviews.text: Very funny and disturbing game. Maybe a bit too much repetitive card theme involving family members. Otherwise ... laughs abound.
customer_reviews.author: Katie and Gary

customer_reviews.title: Its easy to learn and fun
customer_reviews.text: A very fun hilarious game if you have dark humor and can take jokes. May not be a game for a elderly kind of crowd.
customer_reviews.author: JOHNNY

customer_reviews.title: Difficult
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult game sober so imagine being intoxicated and trying to play
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant wait to play with a group
customer_reviews.text: This game seems fun. Went thru some of the cards and they seemed a bit out there. Played it with three people and it was simply hysterical.
customer_reviews.author: J.Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is extremely fun and rather easy to play once you understand how to do it. The directions are quite easy to understand the only thing that kept me from giving the easy to learn section five starts was the double down card isn’t really explained. It doesn’t tell you what it does it just told you what happens when you use it. But over all very fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jessalyn Michele

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game, we played it with a group of ten and it was a blast and I learned so much about my friends. The package arrived within 2 days in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the game - must pick your participants carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Boring.
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea. But the cards are kind boring and unfunny.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Bam

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun party game! We changed the rules a bit but overall a great variety of options
customer_reviews.author: Samantha T.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. A little different than I thought it was going to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: It's basically an average game and "would you rather" in card form. There are definitely better games out there.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M Trausch

customer_reviews.title: Great game for young adults
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious game! My daughter, who is in her 20s, LOVED it!!
customer_reviews.author: TraBa

customer_reviews.title: Mostly fun :)
customer_reviews.text: Fun but took awhile to get into and there seemed to be a lot of “rules” Play however makes it work for you
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Great game & great service
customer_reviews.text: Great experience ordering and receiving this game. I appreciate the emails making sure the game arrived and there were no concerns. The game is lots of fun and all enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game night game for large group of adults
customer_reviews.text: Great game for large group of adults on game night. We had to modify how to play the game a bit from the rules with 12 adults playing to make it move along a bit faster, but it was otherwise a fun time. Don't be shy or embarrass easily if you play this game.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: Cannot wait to play!
customer_reviews.text: The game is in great condition and I looked at some of the cards already... I can tell this will be fun!! Very fun cards. I played with my friends and had a great time.
customer_reviews.author: M********

customer_reviews.title: Game of describing gross things you want others to do.
customer_reviews.text: This game is gross and has some what complicated point system.
customer_reviews.author: C-Row

customer_reviews.title: Raunchy and Hilarious
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful game to play with friends, the scoring system can be a little confusing to most, but all-in-all a great card game.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Pick your poison
customer_reviews.text: I happened across this game on Amazon, while looking for a random new game for game night. I decided to give it a go, and it was a success with our group of friends. It was disgusting, dirty, and hilarious. So, if you have a warped sense of humor, this game's for you. You won't be disappointed. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hilariously Twisted
customer_reviews.text: So all I can really say is wow. I thought my friends and I were pretty twisted, but the discussions and commentary that happened because of this game were insane. I would absolutely recommend this game for people with a twisted sense of humor. I also recommend it for uptight people who really need to get over themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Belford

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome game to play with family or friends
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome game to play with family or friends. We set up scenarios, limits, and conditions for each card to really make each other rethink our choices. I highly recommend purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Get your dark humor friends!
customer_reviews.text: For those with dark humor and friends that are absolutely corrupt, this NFSW edition one hell of a ride.
customer_reviews.author: Fahad Al-Fahad

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This game is so so much fun— it was honestly the highlight of the last game night I hosted. I would absolutely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: its2

customer_reviews.title: fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow directions. Hilarious game! We had so much fun debating our answers after points were given. Package arrived on time and in great shape. We played with 3 people to start with, but I love that you can play this with so many people!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby curtis

customer_reviews.title: This game was far more fun than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: My expectations were low, but in the end I was pleasantly surprised. This game was far more fun than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: matthew e. kotula

customer_reviews.title: FUN GAME
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: Only play with people you like and can take a joke. Debbie Downers are not allowed.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Queen

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Laughs
customer_reviews.text: This game was so much fun to play with a group of friends. We laughed almost the whole time. Easy to learn, easy to box up and unbox. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danelle Hungerford

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious!
customer_reviews.text: So I’m from a huge family that absolutely loves board games. After running across this game on amazon I knew it would be hilarious. This set is definitely not safe for work at all! It had us laughing for hours! Definitely buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: FUN FUN FUN
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fun game. A little bit more racey at times than similar games, but it keeps things interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Love

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adults!
customer_reviews.text: Played at a recent party and had a lot of laughs. We had already been drinking, so there wasn’t a lot of tolerance for the game rules. We just passed out the cards 2 at a time for a hilarious “ would you rather”.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service, well made, and I like that it offers rule variations without being too complicated. Seems more thought out than other games on point distribution and including all players each round while allowing players to tweak it to their liking. I have not played yet (not seller’s fault, I have no social life) but plan to play with friends soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best party games ever!
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing! Me and my friends haven't shared laughs like these with a non- Cards Against Humanity game. The cringe factor to some of the choices definitely adds to the hilarity. I would definitely recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious Game!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fun & hilarious game similar to “What Would You Rather” but more twisted / R-Rated. Great way to kill time with a group of friends. High-Quality packaging. Totally recommend for your next game night!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Mosier

customer_reviews.title: FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: This card game is so much fun, the folks didn't want to leave my house!! I will recommend this game for Adult game nights. Fun, fun, fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: bought for daughter for Christmas. She loves these kind of games
customer_reviews.author: valerie goforth

customer_reviews.title: Fun game and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Had a great time playing with my girlfriend and friend. The package originally came in damaged and when contacted, they sent another out with no fee. Highly recommended. Great for drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: NSFW
customer_reviews.text: This a new type of "would you rather" and i love it. This game makes my friends cringe reading some of these cards. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Felix Reyes

product_meta.title: Pick Your Poison Card Game: The “What Would You Rather Do?” Party Game - NSFW Edition
feature_bullets: Pick Your Poison is a card game of unfathomable “What would you rather do?” scenarios.
Three or more players compete to create the hardest scenario possible by combining two Poison cards (350 included).
Everyone anonymously "Picks their poison" – After the reveal, find out who was "right" and who is just as messed up as you thought.
From the creators of The Voting Game and Hot Seat.
Combine with the Regular Edition for even more fun!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars806 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
